channel.title: Playing a 474 server on a 317 client?
channel.description:
Well, what i wanted to do was play a 474 server on a client that supports 317.
but when i try log onto it, it doesn't show the player correctly. All the NPC's are there, everything is there. but it's just the player that messes up. I was wondering if somebody could show me how to replace the cache or whatevers neccessary to change the client to a 474? Also, i dont know but is there anything to do server sided? Thanks in advance :)
